title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.7 - Motor vehicle inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.7 - Motor vehicle inspections

State Regulations

The department may utilize facilities constructed pursuant to
this Part to carry our the departments inspections of motor vehicles as
authorized or required by State or Federal laws or
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
